name: Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest
description:
Donkey Kong has been "kongnapped" by the nasty K. Rool and the Kremlings, and it is up to Diddy Kong and his girl-friend Dixie Kong to save him.

All the familiar enemies and helpful friends return, along with some new characters, including the wise Wrinkly Kong who will teach you some important lessons in gameplay. Again the emphasis is on banana collecting, where as every one hundred bananas makes one extra life. Apart from beating K. Rool and rescuing Donkey Kong, there are extra missions that can be completed. Collect enough K. Rool Kremkoins to open up the routes to the Lost World, while every level has a hidden Hero Coin to collect.

The Game Boy Advance version also includes a bonus game mode with three minigames (Expresso's Racing, Funky's Flights, and Bag a Bug) plus a time attack mode called Diddy's Dash (complete levels as fast as possible as Diddy Kong). This version of the game also includes an additional boss (Kerozene) and two more collectibles (Golden Feathers that increase Expresso's stats in the Expresso's Racing bonus game and photographs that fill out a scrapbook). Due to the addition of the bonus games and the scrapbook 28 more Hero Coins were also added.
alsoFor: New Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo Switch, SNES, Wii, Wii U | Combined View

shot.caption: Title screen (European version)
Title screen
Main menu
Options screen. You can turn off the volume and play at night without waking up your parents...
Title screen (Japanese version)
To do high jumps and reach the sky, find one of the best buddies in the game: Rattly, the snake!
The hook is helpful to reach high platforms and collect air items. Use them wisely!
This version come with 3 mini-games added: Expresso's Racing is pure speed!
The other is Funky's Flights. Here, the player must have high skills and a lot of patience.
Last, but not least, Bag a Bug. Klubba will disturb you in this awesome bug hunt. Be fast!
Pick the object in your front and throw in enemies! Can be boxes, barrels etc.
The bonus screens (like this) are a different design of SNES version. With more details too.
Impressive! Many things never change... After 10 years, this little dudes still fears insignificant beings?!?
Enguarde is back to action! Here, it uses your long "nose". Very aggressive!
Complete a level aiming in the target from a certain height makes Diddy to dance.
Dixie reach a high madness level with your guitar!
In Cranky's Hut, you can buy some advices and play a mini-game with Expresso. Play to see!
Here is the Kong Kollege. Buy hints to improve your playability and check your homework with Wrinkly.
Swanky and your Bonus Bonanza, a simple game of answers and questions. It's your chance to earn lives!
In Funky's Flights II, test your skills in a mini-game. Funky will record your best time after each mission completed.
Collect your Kremkoins to pay Klubba and access the golden barrel. Or play a mini-game too...
Use these jumping crocheads to gain height and access highest platforms... And mountains too!
Squitter has the capacity to create air webs. Use to reach bonuses and opposite sides.
Jump in Clapper to make the boiling water of a certain level cools temporarily.
Fall or not to fall... That's the question, Dixie!
Pick the cannon balls and aim in this sword. Is she alive?
A fool cat grabs some little apes with your tails. Can they escape of this trap?
If you destroy barrels like this, your time decreases and when reaches 00, this ghost will attack you!
Of this time, a Squawks' relative appeared to give one little help... In good hour!
Kongs in the air! Here, the wind makes the player to go up. Be careful and avoid the enemies!
And the race is gives to start. Finish in 1st is your primordial objective!
You can use the Gyrocopter to back in some worlds and find remaining bonus stages or else life balloons.
Glimmer can help you by lighting in dark areas.
Bramble Blast level: Blasting in the barrels.
Run Rambi, Run! before the big Zinger catch you.
Clapper can also freeze the water to avoid the piranha.
Beware of the acid in Toxic Tower.
